mainText.attr1: In case you are confused how ships acquire target's...
Ships will prioritize targets set by the player - even if Do Not Engage is set.
Ships will then check the target queue - even if Do Not Engage is set.
Ships will then check the guard object for attackers - even if Do Not Engage is set.
At this point ship's postures take effect. EG: Do Not Engage, Engage and Search and Destroy
The setting will now determine whether and how a ship will target.
